description: Alright, now that you have cogs, lets make some power.
Ponder this item, and learn how to use it. This will be your first option for generating kinetic energy.
Pondering will be your best friend. It shows you diagrams on how kinetic blocks work. It is expected that you view the ponder scenes of kinetic devices as you go along this questline.
Now that you have some kenetic energy generation, you can start powering machines. Do note you have a limited amount of energy (measured in SUs). exceeding the capacity halts the entire network.
